sentences.en: After several persons had been let in and let out of the minister's room by the adjutant, an officer was admitted at the dreadful door, whose abject and panic-stricken face had struck Prince Andrey.
sentences.cn: 当副官把这几个人从大臣办公室领进来又把他们领出去以后，有人让一个军官走进一扇可怕的房门里来，军官那低首下心的惊惶的样子使安德烈公爵大为愕异。

sentences.en: Also did not take adjutant, did the general leave alone so?
sentences.cn: 也没带副官, 将军就这样只身离去了?

sentences.en: As adjutant I was responsible for his day-to-day programme.
sentences.cn: 作为副官，我有责任安排他的日常事务。

sentences.en: Conclusion The bibliotherapy is an effective adjutant method of rehabilitation for patients with depression.
sentences.cn: 结论阅读疗法对抑郁症患者是一种有效的辅助康复治疗方法.

sentences.en: During this fight, a divisional adjutant and a commander of the engineer regiment were killed.
sentences.cn: 战斗中, 一名师部副官和一名工兵联队长阵亡.

sentences.en: He looked straight into his adjutant's face and did not recognise him.
sentences.cn: 他直勾勾地望着他的副官的面孔，没有认出他是谁。

sentences.en: He rode at a walking pace to the right, and sent an adjutant to the dragoons with orders to attack the French.
sentences.cn: 他向右方骑马缓行，将一名副官派至龙骑兵部队，并下令进攻法国军队。

sentences.en: I am Guardsman Valleroy , adjutant to Lt . Mumphreys.
sentences.cn: 我是守卫瓦罗瑞, 马姆利少尉的副官.

sentences.en: I'm going out myself with the adjutant to recce training areas.
sentences.cn: 我要亲自和副官出去侦察一下训练地区.

sentences.en: Offer adjutant therapy to accommodative myopia, insomnia, and dark eye sockets and help eliminate fatigue.
sentences.cn: 对调节性近视、消除疲劳 、 失眠 、 黑眼圈等有辅助治疗作用.

sentences.en: Outside the sergeant - adjutant knelt down beside me where I lay, " Name? " he asked softly.
sentences.cn: 到了外边,军曹副官跪在我的身边, “ 贵姓? ” 他轻轻地问.

sentences.en: Rick met his adjutant at the hatch.
sentences.cn: 瑞克在舱里遇到他的副官.

trans.tran_cn: 助手，助理，副官，辅助的东西
trans.tran_en: an army officer responsible for office work
